mapper.insert: insert into IPO_BILLOFLADING (ID, FIRMID, COMMODITYID, COMMODITYNAME, QUANTITY, COUNTS, DELIVERYTYPE, BILLOFLADINGFEE, WAREHOUSINGFEE, INSURANCE, TRUSTEEFEE, REGISTRATIONDATE, CREATETIME) values (SEQ_IPO_BILLOFLADING.NEXTVAL, #{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{counts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliverytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billofladingfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{warehousingfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{insurance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{trusteefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{registrationdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update IPO_BILLOFLADING set FIRMID = #{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITYID = #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITYNAME = #{commodityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNTS = #{counts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELIVERYTYPE = #{deliverytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILLOFLADINGFEE = #{billofladingfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WAREHOUSINGFEE = #{warehousingfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INSURANCE = #{insurance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRUSTEEFEE = #{trusteefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REGISTRATIONDATE = #{registrationdate,jdbcType=DATE}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, FIRMID, COMMODITYID, COMMODITYNAME, QUANTITY, COUNTS, DELIVERYTYPE, BILLOFLADINGFEE, WAREHOUSINGFEE, INSURANCE, TRUSTEEFEE, REGISTRATIONDATE, CREATETIME from IPO_BILLOFLADING where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select ID, FIRMID, COMMODITYID, COMMODITYNAME, QUANTITY, COUNTS, DELIVERYTYPE, BILLOFLADINGFEE, WAREHOUSINGFEE, INSURANCE, TRUSTEEFEE, REGISTRATIONDATE, CREATETIME from IPO_BILLOFLADING
